home.name: Rerubbish
home.title: 「没啥用开源」致力于开发一些对生产力毫无作用甚至是负作用的程序，是一个脱离于实际的，罗曼蒂克般的组织。
home.introduction: [Nothing Useful Open Source] is committed to developing programs that have no impact on productivity or even a negative impact. It is an organization that is detached from reality and romantic in nature.
